title: Lily bulbs' polyphenols extract ameliorates oxidative stress and lipid accumulation in vitro and in vivo.
abstract: Polyphenols have the potential to reduce the risk of many metabolic disorders. Lily bulbs are rich in polyphenols; however, their effects on lipid metabolism remain unclear. This study aimed to explore the effects of lily bulbs' polyphenols (LBPs) on oxidative stress and lipid metabolism.
journal: Journal of the science of food and agriculture
